subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Sendlein, who had been in Arizona for the entirety of his eight-year N.F.L. career, was released in a salary cap move in March after reportedly turning down a $1.5 million offer to stay.
snippet: Sendlein, who had been in Arizona for the entirety of his eight-year N.F.L. career, was released in a salary cap move in March after reportedly turning down a $1.5 million offer to stay.
